title: Authors and Citation
text: Jake Hughey. Author, maintainer. Robert . Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Hughey J, R (2022). rsurveycto: Interact Data 'SurveyCTO'. https://youth-impact.github.io/rsurveycto/, https://github.com/youth-impact/rsurveycto.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rsurveycto: Interact with Data on 'SurveyCTO'},   author = {Jake Hughey and Robert On},   year = {2022},   note = {https://youth-impact.github.io/rsurveycto/, https://github.com/youth-impact/rsurveycto}, }

title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: SurveyCTO platform mobile data collection offline settings. rsurveycto R package uses SurveyCTO REST API read datasets forms SurveyCTO server R data.tables download file attachments. package also limited support write datasets server.

title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: See reference documentation.

what: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: empty column one whose values NA "".

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: d data.table.

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: d modified reference, invisibly.

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
code: library('data.table') d = data.table(w = 3:4, x = c('', 'foo'), y = c(NA, NA), z = c(NA, '')) drop_empties(d) #>    w   x #> 1: 3     #> 2: 4 foo

what: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: Authenticates SurveyCTO fetches corresponding credentials.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
code: scto_auth(   auth_file = NULL,   servername = NULL,   username = NULL,   password = NULL )

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: auth_file String indicating path file containing authorization information, servername first line, username second, password third. auth_file NULL, arguments ignored. auth_file NULL, arguments must provided. servername String indicating name SurveyCTO server. username String indicating username SurveyCTO account. password String indicating password SurveyCTO account.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: scto_auth object authenticated SurveyCTO session.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
code: if (FALSE) { # preferred approach, avoids storing any credentials in code auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt')  # alternate approach auth = scto_auth('my_server', 'my_user', 'my_pw', auth_file = NULL) }

what: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
text: function downloads files bulk.

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
code: scto_get_attachments(   auth,   urls,   output_dir,   private_key = NULL,   overwrite = TRUE )

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
text: auth scto_auth() object. urls Character vector API URLs file attachments. typically derived column data.table returned scto_read(). Can contain missing values. output_dir String indicating path directory save files. private_key String indicating path private key file. needs non-NULL decrypt encrypted file attachments. overwrite Logical indicating whether overwrite existing files.

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
text: character vector file names length urls, NA missing invalid URLs.

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
code: if (FALSE) { auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') scto_data = scto_read(auth, 'my_form', 'form') filenames = scto_get_attachments(auth, scto_data[['my_attachment']]) }

title: Access SurveyCTO metadata — scto_meta
text: function reads metadata SurveyCTO related forms, datasets, groups, publishing information.

title: Access SurveyCTO metadata — scto_meta
text: auth scto_auth() object.

title: Access SurveyCTO metadata — scto_meta
text: list.

what: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
text: function reads data SurveyCTO using API.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
code: scto_read(   auth,   id,   type = c("dataset", "form"),   start_date = "1900-01-01",   review_status = "approved",   private_key = NULL,   drop_empty_cols = TRUE,   convert_datetime = c("CompletionDate", "SubmissionDate", "starttime", "endtime"),   datetime_format = "%b %e, %Y %I:%M:%S %p" )

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
text: auth scto_auth() object. id String indicating ID dataset form. type String indicating whether id corresponds dataset form. start_date Date-time something coercible date-time indicating earliest date-time fetch data. used forms. review_status String character vector indicating submissions fetch. Possible values "approved", "pending", "rejected", combination three. used forms. private_key String indicating path private key file. needs non-NULL read encrypted form data. drop_empty_cols Logical indicating whether drop columns contain NA empty string. convert_datetime Character vector column names data convert strings datetimes (POSIXct). Use NULL convert columns datetimes. datetime_format String indicating format datetimes SurveyCTO. See strptime().

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
text: data.table.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
text: function uses web POST request upload new data dataset SurveyCTO server. function beta, use caution.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
code: scto_write(   auth,   data,   dataset_id,   dataset_title = dataset_id,   append = FALSE,   fill = FALSE )

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
text: auth scto_auth() object. data data.frame upload. dataset_id String indicating ID existing dataset. dataset_title String indicating title dataset. replace existing title, regardless append. append Logical indicating whether append replace dataset. fill Logical indicating whether implicitly fill missing columns NAs, .e., whether allow mismatch columns existing dataset columns data. used append TRUE.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
text: list elements: data_old: data.table previous version dataset. response: object class httr::response() POST request.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
code: if (FALSE) { auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') r = scto_write(auth, data, 'my_dataset', 'My Dataset') }
